sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import {Table,Button} from 'react-bootstrap'; import {USDFormat} from '../libs/numberFormat' import {Deposit} from './components/Deposit' function Summary(props) { const [refresh,setRefresh] = useState(false); const handleRefresh = () => { setRefresh(!{refresh}.refresh); } return (
Profit/Loss {USDFormat(props.summary.pnl)}
NPV {USDFormat(props.summary.npv)}
Cash Deposited    {USDFormat(props.summary.accountbalance)}
Margin Used {USDFormat(props.summary.marginused)}
Amount Allocated {USDFormat(props.summary.amountallocated)}
Margin(%) {props.summary.marginlevel}
Margin Free    {USDFormat(props.summary.marginfree)}
); } export default Summary;
